fun {x y} hxy hx hy =>
  have this :=
    (IntegrableOn.join (join_Icc_Ioc (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hx).left (le_of_lt hxy))
        (IntegrableOn.join (join_Icc_Ioc (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy).left (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy).right)
            hf).left).right;
  Eq.mpr
    (id
      (Eq.trans
        (congrArg (fun x_1 => |x_1| ≤ M * (y - x))
          (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x_1 => x_1 - integ f (Icc a x)) this.right)
            (add_sub_cancel_left (integ f (Icc a x)) (integ f (Ioc x y)))))
        cts_of_integ._simp_1))
    ⟨Eq.mpr
        (eq_of_heq
          ((fun α self self' e'_2 a a_1 a' e'_4 =>
              Eq.casesOn (motive := fun a_2 x => self' = a_2 → e'_2 ≍ x → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a ≤ a')) e'_2
                (fun h =>
                  Eq.ndrec (motive := fun self' => ∀ (e_2 : self = self'), e_2 ≍ Eq.refl self → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a ≤ a'))
                    (fun e_2 h =>
                      Eq.casesOn (motive := fun a_2 x => a' = a_2 → e'_4 ≍ x → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a ≤ a')) e'_4
                        (fun h =>
                          Eq.ndrec (motive := fun a' => ∀ (e_4 : a_1 = a'), e_4 ≍ Eq.refl a_1 → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a ≤ a'))
                            (fun e_4 h => HEq.refl (a ≤ a_1)) (Eq.symm h) e'_4)
                        (Eq.refl a') (HEq.refl e'_4))
                    (Eq.symm h) e'_2)
                (Eq.refl self') (HEq.refl e'_2))
            ℝ Real.lattice.toSemilatticeInf.toLE Real.instLE (Eq.refl Real.lattice.toSemilatticeInf.toLE)
            (integ f (Ioc x y)) (M * (y - x)) (integ (fun x => M) (Ioc x y))
            (of_eq_true
              (Eq.trans
                (congrArg (Eq (M * (y - x)))
                  (Eq.trans (cts_of_integ._simp_4 M (Ioc x y))
                    (congrArg (HMul.hMul M)
                      (sup_of_le_left (of_eq_true (Eq.trans one_le_div'._simp_4 (eq_true (le_of_lt hxy))))))))
                (eq_self (M * (y - x)))))))
        (IntegrableOn.mono this.left (IntegrableOn.const M (Ioc x y)).left fun z hz =>
          cts_of_integ._proof_6 hf M hxy (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hx) (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy) this z hz
            (hM z
              (Eq.mpr (id (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x => z ∈ x) (set_Icc a b)) Set.mem_Icc._simp_1))
                (cts_of_integ._proof_5 hf M hxy (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hx) (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy) this z
                  (Eq.mp
                    (forall_congr fun x =>
                      Eq.trans
                        (implies_congr (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x_1 => x ∈ x_1) (set_Icc a b)) Set.mem_Icc._simp_1)
                          (Eq.refl (|f x| ≤ M)))
                        and_imp._simp_1)
                    hM)
                  (Eq.mp (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x => z ∈ x) (set_Ioc x y)) Set.mem_Ioc._simp_1) hz))))),
      Eq.mpr (id (congrArg (fun _a => _a) (propext neg_le)))
        (Eq.mpr
          (eq_of_heq
            ((fun α self self' e'_2 a a' e'_3 a_1 =>
                Eq.casesOn (motive := fun a_2 x => self' = a_2 → e'_2 ≍ x → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a' ≤ a_1)) e'_2
                  (fun h =>
                    Eq.ndrec (motive := fun self' =>
                      ∀ (e_2 : self = self'), e_2 ≍ Eq.refl self → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a' ≤ a_1))
                      (fun e_2 h =>
                        Eq.casesOn (motive := fun a_2 x => a' = a_2 → e'_3 ≍ x → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a' ≤ a_1)) e'_3
                          (fun h =>
                            Eq.ndrec (motive := fun a' => ∀ (e_3 : a = a'), e_3 ≍ Eq.refl a → (a ≤ a_1) ≍ (a' ≤ a_1))
                              (fun e_3 h => HEq.refl (a ≤ a_1)) (Eq.symm h) e'_3)
                          (Eq.refl a') (HEq.refl e'_3))
                      (Eq.symm h) e'_2)
                  (Eq.refl self') (HEq.refl e'_2))
              ℝ Real.lattice.toSemilatticeInf.toLE Real.instLE (Eq.refl Real.lattice.toSemilatticeInf.toLE)
              (-(M * (y - x))) (integ (fun x => -M) (Ioc x y))
              (of_eq_true
                (Eq.trans
                  (congrArg (Eq (-(M * (y - x))))
                    (Eq.trans (cts_of_integ._simp_4 (-M) (Ioc x y))
                      (Eq.trans
                        (congrArg (HMul.hMul (-M))
                          (sup_of_le_left (of_eq_true (Eq.trans one_le_div'._simp_4 (eq_true (le_of_lt hxy))))))
                        (neg_mul M ((Ioc x y).b - (Ioc x y).a)))))
                  (eq_self (-(M * (y - x))))))
              (integ f (Ioc x y))))
          (IntegrableOn.mono (IntegrableOn.const (-M) (Ioc x y)).left this.left fun z hz =>
            cts_of_integ._proof_7 hf M hxy (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hx) (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy) this z hz
              (hM z
                (Eq.mpr (id (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x => z ∈ x) (set_Icc a b)) Set.mem_Icc._simp_1))
                  (cts_of_integ._proof_5 hf M hxy (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hx) (Eq.mp Set.mem_Icc._simp_1 hy) this z
                    (Eq.mp
                      (forall_congr fun x =>
                        Eq.trans
                          (implies_congr (Eq.trans (congrArg (fun x_1 => x ∈ x_1) (set_Icc a b)) Set.mem_Icc._simp_1) ⋯)
                          ⋯)
                      ⋯)
                    ⋯)))))⟩
